â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
        HAVEN MOBILE MAP - INSTALLATION GUIDE
        Works on ALL Phones: iPhone, Android, Samsung, etc.
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“± WHAT IS THIS?
-----------------
Haven Mobile Map is a mobile-friendly web app for cataloging star
systems on your phone. It works on ALL mobile devices without needing
an app store download!

âœ¨ FEATURES:
â€¢ 2D interactive map visualization
â€¢ List view with search
â€¢ Full data entry (systems, planets, moons, coordinates)
â€¢ Export JSON to upload to master Haven Galaxy map
â€¢ Works 100% offline once loaded
â€¢ No app store needed - completely FREE!


ğŸ“² INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ FOR iPHONE USERS (iOS Safari):
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

METHOD 1: Email Method (EASIEST)
---------------------------------
1. Email "Haven_Mobile_Map.html" to yourself
2. Open the email on your iPhone
3. Tap the HTML file attachment
4. It should open in Safari automatically

   âš ï¸ STUCK? If it doesn't open:
   - Tap and HOLD the attachment
   - Select "Share" â†’ "Safari"
   - Or select "Save to Files" then open from Files app

5. Once open in Safari, tap the Share button (box with arrow)
6. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
7. Name it "Haven Map" and tap "Add"
8. Done! Open it from your home screen like a regular app


METHOD 2: Files App Method
---------------------------
1. Save "Haven_Mobile_Map.html" to your Files app (iCloud Drive)
2. Open Files app on iPhone
3. Navigate to where you saved it
4. Tap the HTML file
5. Choose "Open in Safari"
6. Follow steps 5-8 from Method 1 above


ğŸ¤– FOR ANDROID / SAMSUNG USERS:
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

METHOD 1: Download Method (EASIEST)
------------------------------------
1. Download "Haven_Mobile_Map.html" to your phone
2. Open Chrome browser
3. Go to Downloads (chrome://downloads)
4. Tap "Haven_Mobile_Map.html"
5. It will open in Chrome automatically
6. Tap the menu (â‹®) â†’ "Add to Home screen"
7. Name it "Haven Map" and tap "Add"
8. Done! Open from home screen


METHOD 2: Files Method
-----------------------
1. Save "Haven_Mobile_Map.html" to your Downloads folder
2. Open your phone's file manager
3. Find the HTML file
4. Tap it to open
5. Choose "Chrome" or "Browser"
6. Follow steps 6-8 from Method 1 above


ğŸŒ ALTERNATIVE: Host on Dropbox/Google Drive
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
1. Upload "Haven_Mobile_Map.html" to Dropbox or Google Drive
2. Get a shareable link
3. Open the link on your phone browser
4. Add to home screen as described above


ğŸ’¡ TROUBLESHOOTING
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Problem: "File won't open" or "Can't download"
Solution:
â€¢ Make sure you're using Safari (iPhone) or Chrome (Android)
â€¢ Try the email method instead
â€¢ Make sure the file name ends with ".html"

Problem: "Added to home screen but won't load"
Solution:
â€¢ Delete the home screen icon
â€¢ Open the HTML file in browser again
â€¢ Make sure you have internet for first load
â€¢ Try adding to home screen again

Problem: "Stuck on blank screen"
Solution:
â€¢ Close and reopen the app
â€¢ Make sure you're opening it from the HOME SCREEN, not the browser
â€¢ Clear your browser cache and try again

Problem: "Can't save data"
Solution:
â€¢ Make sure you added it to home screen (PWA mode)
â€¢ Check if you have storage space on your device
â€¢ Don't open in "Private/Incognito" mode


ğŸ¯ USING THE APP
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

TABS:
â€¢ ğŸ“ Map - View systems on 2D interactive map
â€¢ ğŸ“‹ List - Browse systems in card view with search
â€¢ â• Add - Enter new system data
â€¢ âš™ï¸ Data - Export/import JSON, view stats

ADDING A SYSTEM:
1. Tap "â• Add" tab
2. Fill in System Name, Region, Coordinates (X, Y, Z)
3. Tap "â• Add Planet" to add planets
4. For each planet, fill in details
5. Tap "â• Add Moon" to add moons to a planet
6. Tap "ğŸ’¾ Save System" when done
7. Your system appears on the Map!

VIEWING SYSTEMS:
â€¢ Tap any system on the map or list to see full details
â€¢ Use search bar in List view to find systems
â€¢ Zoom in/out on map with controls

EXPORTING DATA:
1. Go to "âš™ï¸ Data" tab
2. Tap "Download JSON"
3. Send this file to upload to master Haven Galaxy map!


ğŸ“¤ SHARING YOUR DATA
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

To share your discoveries with the master map:

1. Export your data (âš™ï¸ Data â†’ Download JSON)
2. Send the JSON file via email, text, or cloud storage
3. Upload to the main Haven Galaxy desktop app
4. Your systems will appear on the master map!


ğŸ”’ PRIVACY & STORAGE
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â€¢ All data stored LOCALLY on your device
â€¢ No internet connection needed after first load
â€¢ No accounts or sign-ups required
â€¢ No data sent anywhere unless you export it
â€¢ 100% free and private


â“ NEED HELP?
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

If you're having trouble installing:

1. Try the EMAIL method - usually the easiest!
2. Make sure you're using Safari (iOS) or Chrome (Android)
3. Make sure the file name is "Haven_Mobile_Map.html"
4. Don't open in "Private/Incognito" mode
5. Ask the person who sent you this file for help
